description:
Job Responsibilities

Demonstrate proven expertise with all aspects of Google Cloud Architecture. Must be an architect.

Demonstrate proven expertise in building out Google Cloud Infrastructure from scratch.

Demonstrate proven expertise with Terraform, Automation Tools, Docker, Kubernetes.

Demonstrate experience troubleshooting infrastructure issues with Google Cloud.

Demonstrate proven expertise in analyzing and rearchitecting / fine tuning environment, improving security posture of environment.

Demonstrate extensive focus with automation.

Experience with Golang Development.

Writing / Consuming API's.

Demonstrate exceptional spoken and written communication abilities.

Must be self driven, analyze environment, build case studies and be a trusted advisor for the customer.

Must demonstrate sufficient expertise across all areas to face off with architects at customer end.

Skills Required

At least 6+ years of experience with Google cloud implementation, design & architecture.

At least 4 + years of experience Golang, Micro Services Frameworks.

Experience with Shell Scripting.

At least 4 + years of experience with Docker/Kubernetes.
